author: yperbasis
content: About EIP-4803: Limit transaction gas to a maximum of 2^63-1. During the last ACD call I mistakenly said that it's a no-change in Erigon & geth. Actually, currently in both geth & Erigon 2^63-1 is the maximum allowed *block* gas limit, not transaction gas limit. So technically EIP-4803 probably entails a code change. In any case, it makes total sense to me to do it.
